|ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8366RB;RTL8366RB, B5D18P1, GB20B, TAIWAN; |voip_ports = |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 84:C9:B2 |oui = 84:C9:B2 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |jtag = yes,, probably,, JTAG1,,, unpopulated,, 20-pin header |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = GRNV6 |manuf_rev = .1U23 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9283;AR9283-AL1A, N4M112.00C, 1119, KOREA; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== This device is used by [[wikipedia:StarHub|StarHub]], a Singaporean ISP. "GRNV6.1U23" and "REV 1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the image shown below. This would strongly indicate '''SGE''' manufacture. There is an unpopulated 20-pin header labelled '''JTAG1''' located near the Flash memory. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== * Connector: J1 * Pinouts: ** 1 - Vcc ** 2 - gnd ** 3 - tx ** 4 - rx * Speed: 115200 {{/Serial info}} ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:20140825_211656.jpg|PCBA overview
